title: Samurai.Shodown.II-1.1[Android][Nan1977]
description:
Samurai.Shodown.II-1.1[Android][Nan1977]


 Release Date: 2 July 2013
 Genre: Fighting
 Developer: SNK PLAYMORE
 Format:. Apk, cache
 Version: 1.1
 Language: English

 System requirements:
 ==========================

 OS Version: Android 2.3.3 +; Processor Type: ARMv7


 SAMURAI SHODOWN II - the era of the classic game Neo Geo (Dandy), great samurai fighting game with one of the deepest and most advanced battle systems. The game has 15 characters, each with their own strengths and weaknesses and weapons. There are different control modes, multiplayer over Bluetooth.

 Setting:
 ==========================

 1) Copy com.dotemu.neogeo.samsho2 folder to sdcard / Android / data

 2) Install APK

 3) Play!
